org.treetank.access

Class NodeReadTrx

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.treetank.access.NodeReadTrx
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    INodeReadTrx

    public class NodeReadTrx
extends Object
implements INodeReadTrx

    NodeReadTrx

    Read-only transaction with single-threaded cursor semantics. Each read-only transaction works on a given revision key.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected IBucketReadTrx mPageReadTrx
      State of transaction including all cached stuff.

      • close

        public void close()
           throws TTException
        Close shared read transaction and immediately release all resources. This is an idempotent operation and does nothing if the transaction is already closed.
        Specified by:
        close in interface INodeReadTrx
        Throws:
        TTException - If can't close Read Transaction.
